version_description:
An all-new version featuring a new map is here! Immerse yourself in a whole new combat experience with a wide range of realistic terrains and breathtaking environments. Upgraded HD graphics and improved detail rendering create a realistic and immersive battleground. Character movements have also been optimized to make actions look more fluid. Show off your skills in diverse locations such as an ancient snow-capped mountaintop castle, volcanic lakes or even under the sea. Share highlights with a single tap and support others via spectator bullet comments. Start your new journey anywhere, anytime.

【Major Update】
1. New Map
From a mysterious castle atop a snowy mountain to a crater basin.
From rolling plains to a tropical seaside town. 
From a romantic lavender field to a majestic rocket launch site.
Multiple terrains with hundreds of tactical routes await your discovery!
Advanced resource optimization has created a more open world!

2. Realistic HD Graphics
Graphics have undergone a full-scale upgrade!
Optimizations of light and shadow effects, detailed textures and rendering.
Experience immersive battles in realistic high definition environments!
Supports fully customizable graphics settings. Freely adjust graphics quality with a single tap to create a visual feast for your eyes!

3. Innovative Battle Experiences
(1) All-new underwater battles
Underwater battles can break out at any moment! Melee weapons and amphibious weapons support battles both on land and underwater.
(2) All-new climbing mechanics
In the new version, players can interact with the downpipes on some types of buildings. Use the pipes to climb up to the roof and launch surprise attacks on enemies on the second floor!
3) Addition of moving trains
Players can freely enter trains and climb on top of carriages to experience battle at breakneck speeds!

4. All-new First-person Mode
Added a first-person battle mode.
You will need better observation skills to detect enemies coming from all directions!
Experience an immersive, alternative world that takes battlefield excitement to another level!

5. Six New Weapons Added
M16A4: High precision, supports both single and burst modes. An effective medium- to long-range rifle.
QBZ-95 Light Machine Gun: Light bullpup machine gun, useful for shooting when standing or crouching.
CS/LR-4: Precision sniper system developed in China, known for its exceptional accuracy when used in a prone position.
There are also three new weapons for underwater combat: The APS Amphibious Assault Rifle, the ADS Amphibious Assault Rifle and the Harpoon allow you to experience the thrill of underwater battles!

6. All-new Vehicles
Three new vehicles have been added, namely the Snowmobile, Pickup Truck and Jet Ski.
Use the Snowmobile to conduct long-range raids in the snow-covered wilderness!
Race across sparkling waters on the Jet Ski!
Ride on the classic Pickup Truck and let everyone know who's top dog!

7. Character Action Tweaks
Character actions have been improved and optimized to make actions looks realistic and fluid, providing players with an even more immersive experience!

1. Added Room Mode

3. Added new costumes

5. Modified the data of some weapons
6. Added Ghillie Suit

【Season 7 Begins!】
1. New pass quests are now available. The type of existing quests has been optimized so that players can level up their passes faster!
2. New season quests are also added, helping players upgrade to advanced pass for exclusive items!
3. Brand new season rewards, outfits, and other substantial rewards are waiting to be claimed!
4. Mark system gets online! Mark the place on the map and show directly to the team!
5. Continuing to optimize the combat to deliver a better game experience!

1. Exciting new adventure: Snowfield Battle!
Enjoy yourself and fight against others in this beautiful vast expanse of whiteness!
When exercising in Snowfield, watch out your steps! Your footprints may expose you!

2. Seasonal goodness, Xmas Battle awaits you!
Lots of Xmas items have been added to the map to celebrate the coming of Christmas!
In the exercise, players may have a chance to act as Santa to embrace more seasonal features! Enjoy yourself, Merry Christmas!

3. National Glory, CAIC-Z 10 and Z-8 are coming! 
The plane carrying players to the exercise has now been changed into CAIC-Z10 and Z-8!
National Glory, Motherland Honor!

4. New Motor Tricycle 
Cool Motor Tricycle will soon arrive in Knives Out!
Play with your friends and enjoy the pleasure and convenience it brings to you!

5. New delicate fashions 
Sorts of style fashions have been added to the shop
Dress up to show your personality!

The best free battle royale game just got better!

1. Drones now available.
Sometimes the pen really is mightier than the sword. Good intel can be just as important as good marksmanship.
Hide and let the drone scout the surrounding terrain to help you get the drop on your enemies. 
Use your intel to make lifesaving decisions on routes and tactics to lead your team to victory.

2. New weapon SVD
Added the all-new sniper rifle SVD.
Short firing intervals let you quickly and accurately rain bullets down on your enemies from afar. 
Don’t miss out on experiencing this super powerful sniper rifle.

3. New snow theme lobby
Let it snow! Be sure to check out the new lobby winter wonderland.
Don’t forget to take a few selfies in the snow.

4. Weapon Tweaks
Enlarged damage area of the grenade and increased its damage dealt.
Increased the trajectory stability for SMGs, making it easier to hit targets when spraying bullets.
Lowered the recoil of the AK47, making it easier to use.   

5. New Appearance Functions.
All-new theme sets, selfies, sharing and various poses. Come and express yourself!

Hide and let the drone scout the surrounding terrain to help you get the drop on your enemies. 
Use your intel to make lifesaving decisions on routes and tactics to lead your team to victory.

2. New weapon SVD
Added the all-new sniper rifle SVD.
Short firing intervals let you quickly and accurately rain bullets down on your enemies from afar. 
Don’t miss out on experiencing this super powerful sniper rifle.

3. New snow theme lobby
Let it snow! Be sure to check out the new lobby winter wonderland.
Don’t forget to take a few selfies in the snow.

4. Weapon Tweaks
Enlarged damage area of the grenade and increased its damage dealt.
Increased the trajectory stability for SMGs, making it easier to hit targets when spraying bullets.
Lowered the recoil of the AK47, making it easier to use.   

5. New Appearance Functions.
All-new theme sets, selfies, sharing and various poses. Come and express yourself!

An all-new version featuring a new map is here! Immerse yourself in a whole new combat experience with a wide range of realistic terrains and breathtaking environments. Upgraded HD graphics and improved detail rendering create a realistic and immersive battleground. Character movements have also been optimized to make actions look more fluid. Show off your skills in diverse locations such as an ancient snow-capped mountaintop castle, volcanic lakes or even under the sea. Share highlights with a single tap and support others via spectator bullet comments. Start your new journey anywhere, anytime.

【Major Update】
1. New Map
From a mysterious castle atop a snowy mountain to a crater basin.
From rolling plains to a tropical seaside town. 
From a romantic lavender field to a majestic rocket launch site.
Multiple terrains with hundreds of tactical routes await your discovery!
Advanced resource optimization has created a more open world!

2. Realistic HD Graphics
Graphics have undergone a full-scale upgrade!
Optimizations of light and shadow effects, detailed textures and rendering.
Experience immersive battles in realistic high definition environments!
Supports fully customizable graphics settings. Freely adjust graphics quality with a single tap to create a visual feast for your eyes!

3. Innovative Battle Experiences
(1) All-new underwater battles
Underwater battles can break out at any moment! Melee weapons and amphibious weapons support battles both on land and underwater.
(2) All-new climbing mechanics
In the new version, players can interact with the downpipes on some types of buildings. Use the pipes to climb up to the roof and launch surprise attacks on enemies on the second floor!
3) Addition of moving trains
Players can freely enter trains and climb on top of carriages to experience battle at breakneck speeds!

4. All-new First-person Mode
Added a first-person battle mode.
You will need better observation skills to detect enemies coming from all directions!
Experience an immersive, alternative world that takes battlefield excitement to another level!

5. Six New Weapons Added
M16A4: High precision, supports both single and burst modes. An effective medium- to long-range rifle.
QBZ-95 Light Machine Gun: Light bullpup machine gun, useful for shooting when standing or crouching.
CS/LR-4: Precision sniper system developed in China, known for its exceptional accuracy when used in a prone position.
There are also three new weapons for underwater combat: The APS Amphibious Assault Rifle, the ADS Amphibious Assault Rifle and the Harpoon allow you to experience the thrill of underwater battles!

6. All-new Vehicles
Three new vehicles have been added, namely the Snowmobile, Pickup Truck and Jet Ski.
Use the Snowmobile to conduct long-range raids in the snow-covered wilderness!
Race across sparkling waters on the Jet Ski!
Ride on the classic Pickup Truck and let everyone know who's top dog!

7. Character Action Tweaks
Character actions have been improved and optimized to make actions looks realistic and fluid, providing players with an even more immersive experience!

New map launched - Tokyo Royale!
Tokyo has become the battlefield! 100 warriors are dropping in to cause big trouble in big Tokyo!
Here, you can see the Tokyo tower, the Shibuya 109 building, Kabukicho and the famous Akihabara intersection. But you won't have time to take in the sights, as behind these familiar buildings, enemies could strike at a moment's notice.
Battle in Tokyo and be the last one standing!

【UPDATES】
1. Season 6 Comes!
New tier 'Master' comes in Season6! It is a tier between 'Diamond' and 'Challenger'!
Tire score changed and calculating method updated! It’s a time for you to join the battle!  

2. Mentoring System Goes Live!
Master and apprentices fight together! 
Player who is Platinum I and above has the qualification to take on an apprentice whose tire is lower. Player under Challenger has the qualification to find a mentor whose tire is higher. 

3. 50v50 Debut
Mode: Players will randomly be placed on one of two sides after entering the game. Kill all the players from the opposing side within the time limit or have more surviving members when the time is up to win.

4. Gaming Experience Fully Updated

2. New season quests are also added, helping players upgrade to advanced pass for exclusive items!
3. Brand new season rewards, outfits, and other substantial rewards are waiting to be claimed!
4. Mark system gets online! Mark the place on the map and show directly to the team!
5. Continuing to optimize the combat to deliver a better game experience!

Season 9 Begins!
1. The S9 Wintry Season officially starts after the version update!
2. An all-new wintry theme with exclusive outfits for the season and other generous rewards.
3. Experience the Winter Snowball throwable exclusive to the season, the mysterious snowman, and more.
4. Your personal Season 8 Rewind will be available. Share it to get an Advanced Supply Medal.
5. For more information, tap on the Season 9 Intel Station in the Event screen to view all the details about the new season.

Knives Out LNY Celebration!
1. The Knives Out LNY Celebration event will take place from January 16 to February 5.
2. Complete quests to earn points and claim Year of the Rat limited items worth 4,980 vouchers, including an all-new permanent orange weapon camo and an all-new permanent avatar frame.
3. Log in from January 23 to January 31 to draw a LNY Limited Supply Box for free.
4. Play the Arcade Mode recommended to you every day to claim LNY Badges, which can be exchanged for event packs.
5. You can also call friends to play with you to earn Year of the Rat limited items.

All-New Rifle: HK50
1. Testing of the all-new HK50 rifle has started. It can currently be picked up on three maps.
2. The HK50 has smooth recoil and is highly stable when fired while scoped, offering an advantage when firing in auto mode.
3. Compared to other rifles, it deals slightly less damage and has a shorter range.

【Season 10 - Eagles vs. Tigers!】   
The Eagles and Tigers factions from the future have returned to their homeland to fight for supplies. A fierce confrontation unfolds in Knives Out.
A special stage weapon, the Wild Cannon—which is a great threat to enemies—has been added to the Fighting Field map.

【Season 10 - Generous Benefits】       
The duration of Season 10 is shorter compared to the previous seasons, but there will be even more benefits this season.
Battle Pass rewards have been updated. Season 10-exclusive weapons, outfits, and vehicles await.
Increased BP Points will be given, so that players can level up their Pass faster to receive rewards earlier.
The Tier Points bonus is 30%, so that players will be able to promote through the ranks quickly.
Achieve the specified tier and complete targets to get an exclusive outfit reward - Codename: Tassel.
The Eagles vs. Tigers events are now available, where you can win exclusive rewards.

【Creative Mode: Eagles vs. Tigers】
Players become characters from either the Eagles or the Tigers factions and fight other against players of the opposing faction. Each faction consists of 25 players.
Players can use the Wild Cannon to deal a lot of damage to enemies.
Level 4 Armor and other advanced supplies will be available to help you gain the edge 
iPad Pro（第 2 代）12.9 英寸显示屏
 over the enemy in battle.

GOGO FES Carnival Celebration Starts

1. During the Celebration Registration event, log in every day to claim up to GOGO FES Limited Edition Lucky Draws.
2. Participate in the Voucher Party event to claim Huge Benefits. Ask your friends to help you get more vouchers.
3. In the Grand Invitation event, invite your friends to complete quests to get points. Accumulate points to claim GOGO FES limited items.
4. In the Joyful Gifts event, complete quests to increase the event level, as well as claim the Kart: Carnival Celebration, Tang Sword: Dauntless Will, and other GOGO FES limited items.
5. Palace Treasures items are now available. Charge up Palace Crystals and use Palace Crystal to redeem Palace Treasures items.
6. From May 1 to May 5, top up every day to get GOGO FES Limited Edition Lucky Draws, Palace Treasures Draw Tickets, Superior Supply Medals, and other rewards.

Mytopia Running, Customize your Recreational Experience!
1. Added a new Running Mode trial zone to the Mytopia, where players can learn more about the new features and gameplay of Running Mode.
2. Players can change the settings of Running Mode on Mytopia to create their own enjoyable and refreshing experience!
3. Added a flight feature to the Mytopia settings to flexibly control the height of characters for more convenience when placing components.
4. To learn more about the Mytopia Running gameplay, log in to the game for more details.

S18 Toy Invasion Event
1. Park Mayhem has been invaded by toy soldiers! The toy soldiers have occupied various parts of Park Mayhem. Defeat them to get memory chips.
2. There are many clues to be found in the Park Mayhem map. Investigate to find memory chips and uncover the truth behind the invasion.
3. A mysterious merchant will appear in Park Mayhem. Use the mini-map to find the mysterious merchant and use memory chips to purchase battle supplies.
4. Toy Invasion Event: Complete exploration quests to collect parts. Collect the target quantity to get a S18 exclusive orange backpack.
5. Invasion Resistance Event: Complete quests to get tokens, and use them to redeem S18 exclusive items and other rewards.
6. The Advanced Supply Box will be updated with new items on June 12. Players have a higher chance of getting the new items from June 12 to June 20.
8. Season supply boxes will be released. Open these for a chance to get Six Vortices: Grand Shuttle, the Blessed Hero outfit, and other S18 themed items.
9. New designs for the Stats screen and Pass screen. First top-up reward for S18: Nutcracker and M27: Toy Kingdom.
10. Peak Season S18 will be available after the new season starts. Compete for the greatest honor!
11. Rewind now available, where you can view S17 stats. Share to obtain rewards.
12. S18 Intel Station now available. You can now learn about S18 in advance!
13. Log in to the game for more exciting details.
